definition: Thorny mountain (several)/Mt Jingshan in Hubei

sentences.english: The Jingshan and Jiaodong Groups metamorphic green formation is the source bed of the gold mineralization in this region.
sentences.chinese: 區內荊山羣和膠東羣變質綠巖建造是金礦化的礦源層。
